name: Star Trek: The Animated Series (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Star Trek: The Animated Series (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: While the Animated Series is definitely not the same as the Original Series, it is still a very enjoyable view and is still Star Trek. It has almost all of the actors from the show doing the voices, which is a huge plus. If you're a true TOS/Star Trek fan, you'll enjoy this, and it'll be worth the money.
reviews.title: Great Star Trek product!

reviews.name: Star Trek: The Animated Series (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Any fan of Strek needs to have this in their collection. As these shows are never seen on TV, this collection is the only place to find them. Helps to fill in some of the gaps between the end of The Original Series, and the beginning of Star Trek the Motion Picture
reviews.title: A must have

reviews.name: Star Trek: The Animated Series (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: i love it it takes me back as a kid in 1973.
reviews.title: star trek the animated series

reviews.name: Star Trek: The Animated Series (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as a gift to a friend and he was thrilled. He has indicated he really enjoys the videos and is happy to have the collection all in one place.
reviews.title: Entertaining video

reviews.name: Star Trek: The Animated Series (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
It seems like receiving an item with no damage is hit or miss. The first one I ordered was damaged. The DVD set was put in a bubble envelop mailer and sent on a 3-4 week journey through UPS to get to my local Walmart. Not a big deal since Walmart let me return it right at the customer service counter in the store. I ordered a second one and It took 3 weeks for it to arrive. Its not the fastest service so if you are in a rush the site to store may not be your best option. I was surprised however when the second DVD set arrived it was packed in a box and then a bubble mailer.
Great Job. Set was perfect. Hopefully this was not some fluke and Walmart is starting to use more secure packaging.
reviews.title: Site to Store service
